name: Green Candy
description: Green Candy is a hybrid marijuana strain that's a cross between Candy Kush and Green Crack. It provides a cerebral sensation and relaxing body effects.
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Relaxed, Energetic, Focused, Depression, Stress, Nausea, Pain, Insomnia, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid, Anxious
